page.title: 15DOG BREEDING IN GILLING WEST
page.content: We have three dogs and three bitches. They are pedigree{Springer Spaniels.} Five are liver and white, one is black and white.My dog is a pet. The main mother is Tessa and she has had about six litters of puppies.She has about{ten to twelve puppies}in a {litter.}They are usually born at night so my mum has to sit up to make sure they are alright.When the puppies are about two weeks old their eyes open } and when they are three weeks old they can lap up powdered milk. At seven or eight weeks they are old enough to leave their mother.{Our dogs are bred {for work.}They are{trained for beating which means{raising pheasants}and {retrieving shot birds.}When they are old enough we take them out for practice with a dummy gun so that they are fit to pick up{pheasants,woodcock} and{grouse}without fear of noise.
